hypothesis_content.title: Gas-to-Price Divergence - Stress Regime Warning
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH price declines >8% over 3 days while gas prices remain elevated (>50th percentile of 90D range), this signals impending STRESS regime transition with 75% probability within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Price declining despite high network fees indicates forced selling or fundamental deterioration. This divergence often precedes broader market stress as ETH weakness spreads. Elevated gas suggests congestion from liquidations or defensive transactions.
entry_conditions: ETH gas price > 50th percentile of 90D range

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC regime transitions to STRESS within 5 days
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC regime remains unchanged after 5 days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price recovers without regime change, indicating temporary selling pressure rather than systemic stress.
